attributes.action: Occupational therapy treatment for Autistic children
attributes.additional_details:
Majority of children diagnosed on the Autism spectrum suffer sensory processing issues. In the UK the NHS do not fund important OT (occupational therapy) treatment for children with Autism and many thousands of children suffer because of it. We want access to OT treatment for all children who suffer sensory processing issues.

Children will greatly benefit from treatment allowing them to organise their sensors and calm inorder to learn.

Please sign our petition for funded OT therapy for all children.
